member.name: T:DWSIM.FileStorage.FileDatabaseProvider
member.summary: File Database Provider for DWSIM, based on LiteDB.

member.name: P:DWSIM.FileStorage.FileDatabaseProvider.IsDatabaseLoaded
member.summary: Checks if the database is loaded.

member.name: M:DWSIM.FileStorage.FileDatabaseProvider.CheckIfExists(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the given file exists in the database.

member.name: M:DWSIM.FileStorage.FileDatabaseProvider.ExportDatabase(System.String)
member.summary: Exports the embedded database to a file.
member.param: Filename to export the database to.

member.name: M:DWSIM.FileStorage.FileDatabaseProvider.ExportFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Exports a file/item from the database to a file in the filesystem.
member.param: Path with filename to save the item to.

member.name: M:DWSIM.FileStorage.FileDatabaseProvider.GetFileAsImage(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a stored image file as a System.Drawing.Image object.
member.param: Image file name in the database.

member.name: M:DWSIM.FileStorage.FileDatabaseProvider.GetFileAsEtoBitmap(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a stored image file as an Eto.Drawing.Bitmap object.
member.param: Image file name in the database.

member.name: M:DWSIM.FileStorage.FileDatabaseProvider.GetFileAsText(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the file contents as plain text.
member.returns: The file contents as plain text.

member.name: M:DWSIM.FileStorage.FileDatabaseProvider.GetFiles
member.summary: Gets a list of all files in the database.

member.name: M:DWSIM.FileStorage.FileDatabaseProvider.GetFileStream(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the contents of a file as a memory stream.
member.returns: A MemoryStream object containing the item.

member.name: M:DWSIM.FileStorage.FileDatabaseProvider.PutFile(System.String)
member.summary: Stores a file in the database.
member.param: Path of the file to import.

member.name: M:DWSIM.FileStorage.FileDatabaseProvider.DeleteFile(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a file from the database.

member.name: M:DWSIM.FileStorage.FileDatabaseProvider.GetSizeinKB
member.summary: Gets the database size in kilobytes.
